Pitch Fest

PITCHFEST

Learn about The Next Big App Design Product Idea Pitch

1 st

2 nd

3 rd

Powered by Eventbrite

Overview

Pitchfest is a yearly competition which brings together New York City’s best and brightest entrepreneurs to compete for seed investments. The competition is designed to give entrepreneurs a platform to pitch to investors and stakeholders while successfully commercialize their products.

This one-round competition kicks off in September, starting with one virtual rounds and culminating in a final live pitch competition on the Queens College campus.

Eligibility

All NYC and Queens residents, Queens College students, faculty, researchers, and alumni are welcome to compete.

Prizes

In addition to cash prizes, winners will receive a discounted one-year membership with the Tech incubator at Queens College. This discounted membership includes access to interns, potential investors, advisors/mentors, the workspace from which you can build out your idea, and workshops to support your business growth.

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need to be a Queens College student to enter?

No. Anyone from any part of NYC can apply for this contest.

What is the deadline to enter?

All submissions must be entered by 11:59 pm October 31th, 2018

What consitutes an eligible submission?

All tech-enabled ideas are eligible for this contest.

Do I need a tech background to submit my idea?

No. Ideas come from all walks of life. As long as you can imagine a tech aspect to your idea you can enter.

If I am selected for the second round, do I have to commit a lot of time to PitchFest?

Sometime commitment is necessary.

Pitch Night

November 7, 2018
The PitchFest competition will culminate with a Pitch Night event- an opportunity to network with VCs, startup founders, industry professionals, and many others from across NYC. Teams will showcase and pitch their ideas to a panel of established entrepreneurs and industry leaders for seed capital and have an opportunity to turn their ideas into reality.   RSVP for Pitch Night […]
